name: microcookiepkg
description: MicroCookie - A minuscule cookie library. Nothing but bones. Compatible with every single browser.

scripts.ugly: if [ ! -d  export ]; then mkdir export; fi && uglifyjs microcookie.js -o export/microcookie-min.js -m reserved=\[k,v,p,e,s,d,w,m,y\] --comments -c passes=5 --ie --v8 && npm run-script htmlprep
scripts.postinstall: echo 'If uglify-js is not installed globally OR sed is not installed, this script will fail!' && npm run-script ugly

author: Nathan Hedge (10Nates)
